channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Texas Gov. Abbott says he’ll swiftly sign new maps on his desk that will boost GOP in 2026
item.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott has promised to sign a new congressional voting map designed to help Republicans maintain their slim majority in Congress.

item.title: US seeks to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia to Uganda after he refused plea offer in his smuggling case
Epstein accuser Virginia Giuffre wrote a memoir. Months after her death, it’s coming out
